title: Profile showing old IGN owner's posts?
body: I just changed my summoner name to Shayla, yesterday during the day actually. I tried to do the summoner link tool but I can't see my own posts or notifications for any replies and it only shows me the old owner's information. Is there any way to get it synced or fixed?

replies.body:
Go ahead and take a look now! I went ahead and synced your profile in hopes in would fix the issue, but if it doesn't make sure to reach back out. 

{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TzAViTIL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-08T00:23:34.978+0000)
>
> Go ahead and take a look now! I went ahead and synced your profile in hopes in would fix the issue, but if it doesn't make sure to reach back out. 
> 
> {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

It didn't :/ it's still showing the old person's rank and posts.
